subject: Funds Release Order.
body:
*Dear Shanon , *













*Thank you for your email, which I have received and noted. I appreciate
the confidence you have placed in me as the new Governor of the bank, and I
assure you that I am fully committed to serving with integrity and honesty.
You were contacted because your name was among beneficiaries that will
receive his contract/inheritance funds. That was why you are being
contacted because the new president Bola Ahmed Tinubu instructed us to
settle all beneficiaries that have not received their funds through the
petroleum trust fund account (PTF).Regarding the fees and taxes required by
the bank, please be informed that these i'll be deducted from your funds.
To proceed with the release of your funds, we need to authenticate your
documents in court. Additionally, it is necessary for you to personally
visit our office to sign for the release of your funds. This is because the
president has instructed us to settle all beneficiaries who have not
received their funds through the petroleum trust fund account (PTF), which
currently holds sufficient funds.In the event that you are unable to come
to our office to handle your file personally, it would be helpful to engage
the services of a lawyer who can represent you and ensure the smooth
release of your funds. If you do not have a lawyer in this regard, please
inform us, and we will arrange for a reliable lawyer to work on your
behalf, ensuring that your documents are properly authenticated in court
and facilitating the release of your funds.Once your documents are being
authenticated, you will receive your funds whichever means you wish to
receive it.I kindly request your prompt response to this matter.Yours
faithfully,Mr. Folashodun ShonubiActing Governor of the Central Bank of
Nigeria. *

subject: Re: Funds Release Order.
body:
Dear Folashodun,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the release of my contract funds. I appreciate your efforts in ensuring that I receive what is rightfully mine. Could you please provide more details on the process of signing the necessary documents in court? I want to make sure everything is done correctly.

Looking forward to your guidance on how to proceed.

Best wishes,
Shanon

subject: Re: Funds Release Order.
body:
*Dear Shanon, *





*I hope this email finds you well. I have taken note of your request, and I
am here to assist you further to enable you to receive your full contract
payment.I have provided below the contact information of a reputable lawyer
who can help you with the authentication of your documents in the court and
act as your representative to facilitate the release of your funds. Please
reach out to him at your earliest convenience and also note that the
lawyer's legal fees will be paid to him, once your funds are being
transferred to your account  the lawyer must receive his legal fee.
Immediately the document is authenticated the court will authorize the bank
for immediate release of your funds without any delays.*
*Name: Barr. Gabriel Madu*
*Email Address: gabriel.madu@yahoo.com <gabriel.madu@yahoo.com>*









*When contacting Mr. Madu, kindly mention that I referred you to him for
assistance. It is crucial to keep me updated on the progress of your
interactions with him. You are to bear the cost of authenticating the
documents and stamp duty fee in the court and that is the only money you
are to spend in this transaction  until you receive your funds in your
account and which will not cost anything more than .$750 or $800Please take
note that the fee for authenticating of the document cannot be deducted
from the principal sum, you are to bear the cost of authenticating the
documents in the court. The entire amount of $10.5 million is currently
held in an Escrow account, rendering the principal amount untouchable until
the document is authenticated in the court on your behalf as the
beneficiary of the $10.5million. Once you have contacted the lawyer, Please
do not hesitate to let me know. I am committed to ensuring a smooth and
successful resolution of your matter.Yours faithfully,Mr. Folashodun
Shonubi *

subject: Re: Funds Release Order.
body:
Hello Shanon,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. It sounds like a crucial step in ensuring the release of your funds. Have you had a chance to reach out to Barr. Gabriel Madu yet? It's important to keep communication open and stay updated on the progress of your case.

If you have any questions or need further assistance, feel free to let me know. I'm here to help you navigate through this process smoothly.

Best wishes,
Shanon

subject: Re: Funds Release Order.
body: I do not understand the content of your mail.

subject: Re: Funds Release Order.
body:
Hello! I'm sorry to hear that you're having trouble understanding the content of my email. Can you please let me know specifically what part is confusing to you? I'd be happy to provide further clarification or answer any questions you may have.

Best wishes,
Shanon

subject: Re: Funds Release Order.
body:
*Dear Shanon, *

*I do not understand everything you wrote in your mail, I will appreciate
it if you can summarize the content of your mail. Meanwhile, you did not
say anything concerning the mail I gave you. I gave you the contact of the
lawyer that will work on your behalf to authenticate your documents in the
court and stand as your representative in signing for the release of your
funds.*


*Please contact him as soon as possible because the first payment of the
year has started and your name is among the beneficiaries that is to
receive their funds in this quarter. So please do your best to contact him
and get your documents authenticated so that you can receive your funds
with others. Take note that if you do not receive your funds in this
quarter, no one knows when the next quarter payment will begin and once
that one starts, you might not be able to receive your funds again as your
funds will be used to settle beneficiaries that are to be paid in the next
quarter payment. *

*Yours faithfully,*


*Mr. Folashodun Shonubi.*

subject: Re: Funds Release Order.
body:
Hello Mr. Folashodun Shonubi,

Thank you for your email. I would like to know more about the process of receiving the funds and how the lawyer will assist in this matter. Can you provide more details on how I can proceed with contacting the lawyer and what documents will be required?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Shanon

subject: Re: Funds Release Order.
body:
*Dear Shanon, *

All you have to do is to use the contact details I gave to you to contact
the lawyer. He is the one that will authenticate all the documents
regarding your payment in the court because if they are not authenticated,
you will not be seen as the real beneficiary of your funds. Once the lawyer
authenticates your documents, the court will instruct the bank to release
your funds to you as the beneficiary of the $10.5million. Once the
documents are being authenticated, they will be scanned and sent to you for
your perusal and record purpose.

Here is the contact information of the lawyer once again.

*Name: Barr. Gabriel Madu*

*Email Address: gabriel.madu@yahoo.com <gabriel.madu@yahoo.com>*

*Please once you have contacted the lawyer, do let me know so that I can be
kept up to speed on the update of the authentication process.*

*Yours faithfully,*


*Mr. Folashodun Shonubi. *

subject: Re: Funds Release Order.
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information with me. It sounds important to get in touch with the lawyer, Barr. Gabriel Madu, regarding the documents for my payment. Could you provide more details about the process and what I should expect when contacting him?

Best wishes,
Shanon

subject: Re: Funds Release Order.
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information with me. It sounds important to get in touch with the lawyer, Barr. Gabriel Madu, regarding the documents for my payment. Could you provide more details about the process and what I should expect after contacting him?

Best wishes,
Shanon

subject: Re: Funds Release Order.
body:
Dear Mr. Shanon,

All you are to do is to contact the lawyer as I have been saying, he is the
one that will represent you and sign for the release of your funds and also
authenticate your documents in the court, to enable the court to instruct
the bank to release your funds to you. I do not know why you are wasting
time on this. The enbursement of your total funds lies in both his hands
and your hands, if you do not contact him, you cannot have this funds.

Contact him as soon as possible because the time is ticking. Beneficiaries
are already getting paid, and if you are not paid in this quarter, I do not
know when you will be paid because the next payment is still unknown.

Yours faithfully,

Mr. Folashodun Shonubi.

subject: Re: Funds Release Order.
body:
Hello Mr. Shonubi,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. It sounds important to contact the lawyer promptly to ensure the release of funds and documents. Can you provide more details about how I can reach out to the lawyer? I want to make sure everything is in order as soon as possible.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Shanon

subject: Re: Funds Release Order.
body:

*Mr. Folashodun Shonubi.*

subject: Re: Funds Release Order.
body:
Hello Shanon, thank you for sharing this information. Can you tell me more about why I should reach out to Barr. Gabriel Madu? What kind of services does he offer?

Best wishes,
Shanon
